First Turbase Apps

  • By Artem V. Shamsutdinov
  • February 17th, 2024

For a while now there has been a plan to run Sapoto.net and Votecube.com as the first Apps on Turbase. Sapoto.net is a social support network and Votecube is a public opinion poll record. These are very important projects but there is something recent events brought up a need for something even more important.

The ongoing conflicts in Sudan, Gaza and Ukraine prompted me to think about how to limit warfare to avoid loss of life and limb. As regular citizens there is little we can do to contribute to the creation of movement in that direction except to help envision what a world with non-lethal, non-maiming war would look like. Thus the first set Apps that will be developed for Turbase will be in following suite of games:

The Struggle continues anew - XYZ
